column5: Just skimmed over Zone 20(Lake Ontario) and it seems Pike re-open for fishing on the first Saturday of May being the 1st of May  Sound right, 29days sounds to good to be true haha. With the warm weather are jerkbaits going to be the main baits to throw or should I bother giving small sucker's under float's a try. I got out 4 times for the Pike (3 in pickering 1 in oshawa) and only managed 1 fish so it was definitely a hard thing to do catching them in that cold cold water.  Anyway just thought I would ask and see what people are doing. PM me if somebody wants to give me a tour of the Pike fishing in the Toronto Islands area.  Tightlines, MTBF
Just finally found out myself.. Caught quite a few in Georgian Bay and never knew the correct name.
haha Im just currious.. cuz well i havnt caught one since ice out
Well get something this week in zone 17 or in 20 somthin days on Lake Ontario
I got some free lucky strike spoons from the school today boys... See how the Pike like the Student Association.
